title: Pregnant Jenna Dewan wears workout gear as she leaves Pilates class
text:
Jenna Dewan recently announced she is pregnant with her second child.

And on Monday, the Step Up star, 38, stepped out for a morning Pilates class while covering her growing baby bump.

While the cover girl was out-and-about she bundled up in an all-black outfit and carried a bottle of Fiji water.

Morning workout: Jenna Dewan stepped out for morning Pilates class while covering her growing baby bump on Monday

She's happy! She quickly turned her frown upside down and smiled for the camera while sipping on her water

The actress, who also shares her six-year-old daughter Everly with her ex husband Channing Tatum, wore a black long cardigan over-top a pair of black leggings.

She had a pair of sleek black shades on that went with the dark look as she carried a matching leather handbag on her arm.

Jenna made sure to add just a bit of color to her morning look with a pair of army green Nikes.

Last week, the dancer opened up to People about the upcoming new addition with her boyfriend Steve Kazee, 43.

Looking fab! The actress wore a black long cardigan over-top a pair of black leggings

'It was excitement all around. Everywhere excitement,' she said during her interview. '[Everly] said she's waited her whole life for a sibling. "I've waited my whole life for this, Mom." It is so cute.'

She even revealed that Everly is so thrilled, she tells strangers that she is going to be a big sister.

'She is going around lifting up my shirt to literally anyone, and goes, "I'm going to be a big sister! Did you know there's a baby in my mommy's belly? Do you want to touch it?" She will just lift up my shirt. She kisses [my belly].'

Happy: Jenna and her boyfriend Steve Kazee smile at the WWE 20th Anniversary Celebration in early October

She went on to talk about her boyfriend of over a year who she calls a 'divine gift' in her life.

'It's this electric connection that just works,' she said about the Tony winner.

'The timing felt right. Expanding our family was something that was important to both of us and it just flowed.'

Jenna was previously married to Channing from 2009 before announcing their divorce in 2018.
